title: Small Business Kickstart
shortDesc: A quick microloan designed for small shops and street vendors to boost daily operations.

title: Education Support Loan
shortDesc: Flexible microloan for students needing help with tuition fees, books, or exam costs.

title: Emergency Medical Loan
shortDesc: Instant microloan for urgent medical expenses, available 24/7 with fast approval.

title: Home Repair Assist Loan
shortDesc: A simple microloan to help families repair roofs, floors, electrical issues, and more.

title: Women Entrepreneurs Loan
shortDesc: Special microloan for women-led startups, cottage industries, or home-based businesses.

title: Agriculture Growth Loan
shortDesc: Support for farmers to purchase seeds, fertilizers, tools, and irrigation supplies.
